mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM registered WHERE doc_id=#{doc_id} AND appointment_date=#{appointment_date} AND timeframe=#{timeframe}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO registered (doc_id, patient_id, fee, registration_time, appointment_date, timeframe,status) VALUES (#{doc_id}, #{patient_id}, #{fee}, #{registration_time}, #{appointment_date}, #{timeframe},0)
mapper.select: SELECT r.*,p.`name` as patient_name FROM registered r,patient p WHERE r.patient_id=p.patient_id and doc_id=#{docId} and status !=1 ORDER BY appointment_date;
